fr.escape.game.entity.ships

Class AbstractBoss

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.game.entity.ships.AbstractShip
      • fr.escape.game.entity.ships.AbstractBoss
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collisionable, Drawable, Entity, Moveable, Boss, Ship, Updateable

    public abstract class AbstractBoss
extends AbstractShip
implements Boss
    This class provide a skeletal implementation of any Boss in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractBoss

        public AbstractBoss(BodyDef bodyDef,
            FixtureDef fixture,
            java.util.List<Weapon> weapons,
            int life,
            EntityContainer container,
            AnimationTexture textures,
            CollisionBehavior collisionBehavior)
        AbstractBoss Constructor using AbstractShip constructor
        Parameters:
        bodyDef - : The body definition for the JBox2D Object.
        fixture - : Fixture linked to the JBox2D Body.
        weapons - : List of Weapon usable by an AbstractShip.
        life - : Initial life of the AbstractShip.
        container - : EntityContainer in witch the AbstractShip is contained.
        textures - : Texture use for the AbstractShip.
        collisionBehavior - : Behavior used by this AbstractShip to manage JBox2D Collisions.

        Description copied from interface: Updateable

        Update the state of the Entity.

        This Entity can use the given Graphics if it's a Drawable.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        delta - Time elapsed since the last update
